title: The Beatles Anthology 3. February 1964 to July 1964
description: This was still a time of wonderment on both sides of the equation; the world couldn't believe this magnificent creation and neither could they believe the world. Wherever they went now, first America, then Europe, the Far-East and Australia, they brought Beatlemania with them. Episode 3 starts with their arrival in New York and a press conference, limo and hotel film footage and Murray The K.the Beatles first appearance on the Ed Sullivan show, a train trip to Washington, live at the Olympia Stadium, with some live colour film footage, their vacation in Miami, packing and returning to England, making A Hard Day's Night [508638], excerpts from A.H.D.N, In His Own Write by John Lennon. a world tour, Jimmy Nichol substitutes for Ringo, Ringo rejoins in Australia and A Hard Days Night premiers in Liverpool. Songs Included: All My Loving, She Loves You, I Saw Her Standing There, Please Please Me, I'll Follow The Sun, This Boy, If I Fell, Can't Buy Me Love, Long Tall Sally, You Can't Do That, and out-takes from I'll Be Back.
